slots.headline: FAQs
slots.body: Everything you need to know about our services.

items.question: What services do you offer?
items.answer: We provide luxury interior design, custom furniture, and professional photography services.

items.question: What areas do you serve?
items.answer: We operate in Los Angeles, New York City, and Miami, with select projects worldwide.

items.question: How do I start a project?
items.answer: Contact us through our form or email to schedule an initial consultation.

items.question: What is your pricing structure?
items.answer: Pricing varies by project scope. We provide detailed quotes after initial consultation.
